title: Riot does nothing but banning people.
body: This rank restriction system is really bad and useless. All the bad player will become a crying baby and saying "I will report you" "Report this guy". They don't even know how to play and feeding and this riot bans who actually try to win. I think this is why NA is so bad and so many noobs are playing. They just report good people like people who knows how to play because they said something to them. This stupid system is just causing more crying noobs.

replies.body: There is a difference between trying to win, and telling someone they need to kill themselves because they had a bad game. Figure out the difference.
Lets get one thing straight here ass hole. Just because you are good at a game that doesn't make it OK to be a shit human being.
you must be one of those noobs ha

> you must be one of those noobs ha

You do know you just dug your hole even deeper still right? Just face it no one here is going to agree to your logic to just get over yourself and learn to improve as a person.

I've played thousands of ranked games over five seasons, and I've literally never received a warning, chat restriction, ban, etc. I also "try to win." Tbh the LoL disciplinary system is INCREDIBLY lenient and forgiving and so if you are having problems with it and are receiving punishments, then you are a member of the elite percentile of toxic players and should probably be kinder to your fellow players.
How do I be nice to them? Most of them don't listen. It's like below diamonds have no brain.
